name: Hostile Work Environment
description:
After you play the game, please provide feedback for us at https://goo.gl/forms/6jqOvG7UN...

Hostile Work Environment is a puzzle-platformer where you play as a manager who works at Boring Inc. That is, until Boring Inc. gets bought out by the Incantation Corporation! Now you're given a set of spells and a sweet wizards robe, and the new board of directors have summoned you to their office. On your way up the executive tower, you must solve a variety of problems and help out your incompetent underlings deal with the chaos introduced by the company merger!

Hostile Work Environment is a student project designed as part of the University of Texas GAMMA Program in the 3D Game Design Capstone course.

The team is:

  • Samuel Braley - programmer, designer
  • Ricardo Escobar - programmer, designer
  • Erin Pennington - programmer, designer
  • David Bayne - 3D artist, designer
  • Minjie Kim -2D artist, designer
  • Nick Morales - 3D artist, designer
  • Clay Damron - 3D artist, designer
  • Drake McIntosh - Musician

Made with <3 in Austin, Texas.
